research.queryPlaceholder: Describe your topic or question in detail: specify context, constraints, desired analysis depth. The more specific your query — the better the result.
research.queryHint: Example: "Compare the efficiency of solar and wind power plants in Northern Europe from 2020-2025."

options.modeHelp: Mode affects research depth and speed
options.modeHint: Standard — optimal balance. Deep — maximum sources and verification. Quick — brief answer in a minute.
options.typeHelp: Type determines the format and structure of the report
options.typeHint: Facts — overview with conclusions. Comparison — pros/cons table. Trends — dynamics and forecasts. How-to — step-by-step guide.

progress.resuming: Restoring progress... Research continues on the server.

clarification.title: Clarify your request
clarification.subtitle: Answer questions for more accurate research

result.title: Research result
result.qualityHighHint: High reliability: information confirmed by multiple authoritative sources
result.qualityMediumHint: Medium reliability: key facts verified, but additional verification recommended
result.qualityLowHint: Basic level: information collected, but requires independent verification before use
result.sourcesHint: List of sources used with their authority ratings
result.authorityHigh: High source authority (official sites, scientific publications)
result.authorityMedium: Medium source authority (trusted media, industry portals)
result.partialResultHint: Research completed, but some aspects may not have been verified
result.gradeAHint: High reliability: most facts verified with reliable sources
result.gradeBHint: Good quality: key facts verified, some details need clarification
result.gradeCHint: Satisfactory: some facts unconfirmed, additional verification recommended
result.gradeFHint: Low quality: most facts unconfirmed, use with caution

errors.identityFailed: Identity error. Please reload the page.

warnings.quality_gate_warning: ℹ️ Quality check found statements not fully supported by sources. Grade downgraded.
warnings.grade_f_message: Insufficient verified data. Results are provided for reference only. We recommend using a deeper mode.
warnings.suggest_deeper_standard: Some facts are unverified. Consider repeating the research in Standard mode for better accuracy.
warnings.suggest_deeper_deep: Some facts are unverified. Consider repeating the research in Deep mode for maximum verification.

gradeTooltips.A: High reliability. Most facts are verified by sources.
gradeTooltips.B: Good reliability. Key facts are verified, minor gaps exist.
gradeTooltips.C: Limited reliability. Some facts are unverified. We recommend double-checking.
gradeTooltips.F: Insufficient verified data. Results are provided for reference only.
